name: Kinless
description:
Still in progress, but almost completed.

The story follows Jomar who is a hitman, roaming alone in the twilight if a cyberpunk age. He wants to buy a new identity but he can’t afford it, so when he encounters a boy who wants to hire him as a bodyguard on his journey to the top of a fabled mountain, he accepts the job.

Why does Jomar need a new identity?

Who is this boy and why does he want to get to the top of a fabled mountain?

Play Kinless to carve and discover your own answers!
